attributes.action: Ban the sell of fireworks to the public in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
I helped raise nearly 300,000 signatures for our petition this year and on the 26/11/18 Parliament rejected it.

Each year so many animals are dying or suffering horribly due to the publics disregard for the law. These are not enforced at all! 

Mia's Legacy is a campaign I've started after watching her die under a car due to running because of the fireworks!
attributes.background: Fireworks may well be a part of our history, but they are solely the reason for our pets dying and suffering and soldiers of war young and old suffering horrendous flashbacks because with each bang they believe they're back in the war. We are supposed to protect, not kill and hurt animals soldiers.
